item.title: How Long Does an EV Take to Charge
item.description: How long does an electric car take to charge? # After “How far does it go?”, the next most common question I’ve heard since buying an electric car is “How long does it take to charge?”. I think a lot of people find the answer surprising, I certainly did when I started investigating purchasing a hybrid and quickly found myself drawn towards the mysterious world of EV ownership. The answer though is “it depends…”, quickly followed by “and that’s not really the right question anyway…”
